title: David Guetta | United at Home - Paris Edition from the Louvre
author: David Guetta
description:
DONATE NOW on https://davidguetta.com/donate

In partnership with @PlayStation France & @Xiaomi France 

After raising $1.5 million (USD) for charities and amassing over 50 million views in Miami and New York, “United At Home” continues from the iconic city of Paris with a phenomenal production in front of the Louvre museum’ glass pyramid. In an effort to unite people around the globe, David Guetta is inviting everyone to join him in celebrating NYE and spreading the holidays spirit to benefit UNICEF, Les Restos du Coeur and the Musée du Louvre.

Follow David Guetta:
https://www.davidguetta.com
https://facebook.com/DavidGuetta
https://www.twitter.com/DavidGuetta
https://www.instagram.com/davidguetta

Follow the Louvre:
https://www.instagram.com/museelouvre/
https://twitter.com/MuseeLouvre
https://www.facebook.com/museedulouvre/
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCafm6w_rPndqAtokQy04Jdw
https://www.linkedin.com/company/musee-du-louvre/

localize.description:
立即在https://davidguetta.com/donate上捐款

与@PlayStation France和@小米法国合作

在为慈善机构筹集了150万美元(约合150万美元)并在迈阿密和纽约积累了超过5000万的点击量后，“在家的联合”(United At Home)在标志性城市巴黎继续上演，在卢浮宫博物馆的玻璃金字塔前进行了一场惊人的演出。为了团结世界各地的人们，David Guetta邀请大家与他一起庆祝NYE，并传播节日精神，以造福联合国儿童基金会、Les Restos du Coeur和卢浮宫博物馆。

关注大卫·盖塔(David Guetta)：
https://www.davidguetta.com
https://facebook.com/DavidGuetta
https://www.twitter.com/DavidGuetta
https://www.instagram.com/davidguetta

沿着卢浮宫走：
https://www.instagram.com/museelouvre/
https://twitter.com/MuseeLouvre
https://www.facebook.com/museedulouvre/
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCafm6w_rPndqAtokQy04Jdw
https://www.linkedin.com/company/musee-du-louvre/
localize.title: 大卫·盖塔(David Guetta)|主场联队-来自卢浮宫的巴黎版

localize.description:
立即在https://davidguetta.com/donate上捐款

與@PlayStation France和@小米法國合作

在爲慈善機構籌集了150萬美元(約合150萬美元)並在邁阿密和紐約積累了超過5000萬的點擊量後，“在家的聯合”(United At Home)在標誌性城市巴黎繼續上演，在盧浮宮博物館的玻璃金字塔前進行了一場驚人的演出。爲了團結世界各地的人們，David Guetta邀請大家與他一起慶祝NYE，並傳播節日精神，以造福聯合國兒童基金會、Les Restos du Coeur和盧浮宮博物館。

關注大衛·蓋塔(David Guetta)：
https://www.davidguetta.com
https://facebook.com/DavidGuetta
https://www.twitter.com/DavidGuetta
https://www.instagram.com/davidguetta

沿着盧浮宮走：
